website_summaries.verdict: Head, neck, and back support through unique memory foam in a butterfly-shape.
pros: Butterfly design provides support in all the right places, whether for back- or side-sleepers
High-quality, odor-free, hypoallergenic memory foam is cool and breathable, and adjusts to the body's natural contours
cons: The shape of this pillow is different than others, and may take some time to get used to and to utilize effectively for head and back support

customer_reviews.title: Good Neck Support Pillow with One Major Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this pillow, which is saying something as I return most of them. It seems well made, didn't smell too badly, I aired it out and used it the same day. I would only wish it was an inch thicker all the way around. Even petite as I am, my head will go through it and end up nearly on the bed - about two inches from it. I love the way it cradles my head though so I push it up against another pillow for more support. It is not a stand alone pillow for me but I think it will last a good long time and it meets most of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sonlit Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Mine arrived yesterday and I just ordered another today!
customer_reviews.text: I experience numbness in my arms down to my hands at night due to a degenerating cervical disk. Pillows are a challenge. In the never ending search I decided this one had some great options and I was not disappointed. Thought the night I have to move shift to avoid my arms becoming completely numb. This is the first pillow that has given me enough options to shift easily, cradle my head and neck perfectly and fall back to sleep without all the plumping shifting that wakes you and is so very frustrating. I love it and just ordered another. I have a temperpedic, a coop, and so many more. This one cradles your head in so many ways.
